document.discussion_title: APC Technology : To Issue Shares Under Loan Note Conversion (ALLISS) | 4-Traders
document.topic_text:
LONDON ( Alliance News ) - Electronic components distributor APC Technology Group PLC said Monday it will issue 125,000 new ordinary shares following the conversion of loan notes held by the company's Chief Executive Richard Hodgson . APC Technology said it has agreed with Richard Hodgson to convert all the loan notes with a face value of GBP10,000 held by him into 125,000 ordinary shares, at a conversion price of 8.00 pence per share. Shares in APC were down 1.5% Monday morning at 8.50p.
The group said an application has been made to the London Stock Exchange for the 125,000 new ordinary shares to be admitted to trading on AIM. Following admission, the company's issued share capital will comprise of 127.8 million shares.
Following admission, Richard Hodgson's total beneficial interest in the company will comprise of 1.6 million ordinary shares, representing a 1.3% stake. By Lucy Heming ; lucyheming@alliancenews.com
